actions.committee: House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Interstate and Foreign Commerce.

official_title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the program of assistance for health services for domestic migrant agricultural workers.

summary.text: Extends beyond 1973 the program of assistance for health services for domestic migrant agricultural workers under the Public Health Service Act, and authorizes such appropriations as may be necessary for each fiscal year. (Amends 42 U.S.C. 242h)

titles.title: A bill to amend the Public Health Service Act to extend the program of assistance for health services for domestic migrant agricultural workers.
